section1.title: The essential platform for animal lovers
section1.baseline1: Do you want to adopt an animal ? Need a training course for your dog ? Any advice to share ? A health emergency ? Everything is on your MyPetsLife platform !
section1.baseline2: We support you throughout the life of your animal thanks to unique features that make their management easier.

section2.careContent1: Become an actor in the well-being of your animals ... Do not bother looking for the health record of your dog, your cat, your rabbit, or even your snake, it is available in your phone and even on a computer !
section2.careContent2: Thanks to the completely dematerialized health record, you can quickly, easily and easily manage the health of your animals. You can update their vaccines, add their treatments, and even download all the documents you will need.
section2.shareContent1: MyPetsLife is above all a community of animal enthusiasts ! On our platform, you can discuss, discuss, and share many tips and advice through a dedicated forum area. It's time to find the best tips for pampering your pets ... and why not find your future walking buddies ?
section2.shareContent2: At MyPetsLife, we are committed to giving you the best advice to pamper your companions. On the blog, you can find unique articles written by animal experts on various subjects ! News, care, health, discover articles to support you on a daily basis.
section2.lifeContent1: The MyPetsLife Platform will make everything you need to do with your animals easier. And it starts as soon as you are adopted !
section2.lifeContent2: We have set up a platform referencing many animals offered for adoption by associations. Do not hesitate, they are just waiting to be loved ! Thanks to MyPetsLife, it has never been so easy to adopt !
section2.lifeContent3: It's not always easy to estimate your expenses for products for pets ... With our application, you will be able to estimate, and integrate all your expenses related to each of your animals. Our only goal ? You make life easier !

section3.nomadContent: Our platform is accessible on all media, computer, tablet or smartphone, MyPetsLife accompanies you anywhere in the world. Access our services when you want, when you want and be sure to find all the information from your companion to take care of him in all situations.
section3.fluidContent: Intuitive, fast and simple, our platform will not cause you any navigation problems. No more long loading times, buttons that do not work and complicated interfaces. MyPetsLife has surrounded itself with design experts to make your life easier.
section3.communityContent: Made for you and by you, our features are designed and developed for animal lovers. Your companion is at the center of all the services that MyPetsLife offers in order to be able to make his life and yours even more beautiful.

newsletter.description: To benefit from the news and be able to take advantage of MyPets Life offers in advance !

delete.title: Delete my profile
delete.content2: Do you want to leave us already ?
delete.content3: If your decision is made then just send an email with the email address of this account to
delete.content4: . Your email must then contain your first name, last name, telephone number and the reason for your departure.
delete.content5: If you still hesitate, take your time: do not hesitate to contact us directly at
delete.content6: to ask us all the questions you want.
